title: I got a 10 game chat restriction when can earn hextech rewards
body: How long will it take for me to earn hextech rewards?

replies.body:
There's no set amount of time, as it could encourage targetted behavior. According to our [Hextech Crafting Restrictions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions), it takes a consistent trend of positive behavior before loot privileges can be earned back.

I hope this helps, please let me know if you have any questions.
ok thx i'll just stop being bad person.
